text: "Shout to the Top!" is a 1984 song by The Style Council and appeared on their second studio album Our Favourite Shop. It went to number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in New Zealand, number 10 in Ireland, number 1 in Paraguay and number 8 in Australia. ==Track listings== ===7" single=== *A "Shout to the Top!" (edit) – 3:16 *B "Ghosts of Dachau" – 2:55 ===12" single=== *A1 "Shout to the Top!" – 4:16 *A2 "Shout to the Top!" (instrumental) – 4:12 *B1 "The Piccadilly Trail" – 3:46 *B2 "Ghosts of Dachau" – 2:51 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:The Style Council songs
title: Shout to the Top!
